entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, Caledon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:36 PM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Rainshower, 12.3°C

Visibility: 9.7 km

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1 with patchy frost. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1 with patchy frost. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 16 May 2016
